      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove​(Move move)
        First checks if the move in the argument is valid, and if it is, makes the move and returns true. If the movement is invalid, it tries to make a sliding move (side-step) move and returns false fo
        Parameters:
        move - The move that the user wants to make
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful , false if the move was unsuccessful

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Checks if the game is over in the board.
        Returns:
        true if there is a winner in the board or when the number of moves reaches 96.

      • isValidSelection

        public boolean isValidSelection​(Group group)
        Checks if the group of marbles that the user chose are valid.
        Parameters:
        group - the group of marbles that the user chose.
        Returns:
        true if (group.getMarbles.size() == 1 || (group.size() == 2 && marble1 and marble2 are neighbouring) || (group.size() == 3 && marbles 1,2,3 are in a line)) else, return false.
